title: How Many Calories in Pasta?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in pasta per 100g serving, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition details for cooked plain pasta.
assumptions: Cooked plain pasta (boiled, drained), no sauce, oil, or seasonings; standard semolina wheat pasta.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by pasta type, brand, cooking method, and portion size. Dry vs. cooked weights differ significantly; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100g of cooked plain pasta contains about 131 kcal and 5.8g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp olive oil while cooking

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g cooked pasta?
faqs.a: About 131 kcal for plain cooked pasta.

faqs.q: What's the carb content in pasta?
faqs.a: Around 25g carbs per 100g cooked, mostly from complex starches.

faqs.q: How many calories in dry pasta?
faqs.a: Dry pasta has ~371 kcal per 100g, as it absorbs water when cooked.
Yes, about 5.8g protein per 100g cooked plain pasta.

faqs.q: How to reduce calories in pasta?
faqs.a: Portion control, choose whole grain varieties, or pair with veggies instead of heavy sauces.
